kw.name: Generate Random String
kw.doc: Generates a string with a desired ``length`` from the given ``chars``.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Run And Return Rc And Output
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the RC and output.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

kw.name: Run And Return Rc And Output
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the RC and output.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

arguments.arg: ozone sh bucket info /${volume}/mybucket1 | grep -Ev 'Removed|WARN|DEBUG|ERROR|INFO|TRACE' | jq -r '. | select(.name=="mybucket1") | .metadata | .gdprEnabled'

kw.name: Run And Return Rc And Output
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the RC and output.
kw.msg: Running command 'ozone sh bucket info /lzrtc/mybucket1 | grep -Ev 'Removed|WARN|DEBUG|ERROR|INFO|TRACE' | jq -r '. | select(.name=="mybucket1") | .metadata | .gdprEnabled' 2>&1'.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Run And Return Rc And Output
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the RC and output.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: WARNING: An illegal reflective access operation has occurred WARNING: Illegal reflective access by org.apache.ratis.thirdparty.com.google.protobuf.UnsafeUtil (file:/opt/hadoop/share/ozone/lib/ratis-thirdparty-misc-0.2.0.jar) to field java.nio.Buffer.address WARNING: Please consider reporting this to the maintainers of org.apache.ratis.thirdparty.com.google.protobuf.UnsafeUtil WARNING: Use --illegal-access=warn to enable warnings of further illegal reflective access operations WARNING: All illegal access operations will be denied in a future release Releasing lock on resource /lzrtc/mybucket1 without acquiring lock
